mapper.select: select tra.id,tra.owner,tra.amountOfMoney,tra.name,tra.expectedClosingDate,tra.stage,tra.type, tra.source,tra.description,tra.contactSummary,tra.nextContactTime,mar.name as activityId, cus.name as customerId, con.fullName as contactsId from tbl_transaction tra left join tbl_marketing_activities mar on tra.activityId = mar.id left join tbl_customer cus on tra.customerId = cus.id left join tbl_contacts con on tra.contactsId = con.id where tra.id=#{id}
